duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead financial modeling, planning, analytics, and reporting for all business units.
Consolidated reporting including preparation of executive reports and presentations.
Create, analyze, and present monthly/quarterly/annual reports.
Drive growth and profitability through strategic forecasting and business analysis.
Analysis of internal financial information and financial modeling.
Collaboratively evaluate opportunities for business growth and cost control.
Contribute to the forecast and budgeting processes.
Be involved in corporate strategy projects including divestitures, mergers, and acquisitions.
Provide input on potential changes to or the creation of policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance or Accounting required (Master's preferred)
